item.title: New looping info
item.content:encoded:
New stuff that loops:

Almost EVERY perm that didn't loop before does. Just looped today, kept my nin dog/puppet/fan, chakra armor, trench knives, dog collar, etc. Only thing I lost was counterfeit permit, and the stuff from doing reaper missions.
